title: Amazon Prime Video disappears from Apple's app stores
text:
Amazon Prime Video disappears from Apple's app stores

Stock Markets 3 hours ago (Oct 04, 2019 16:40)

(Reuters) - Amazon (NASDAQ: ) (NASDAQ:AMZN) Inc's streaming service, Prime Video, disappeared from Apple (NASDAQ: ) (NASDAQ:AAPL) Inc's app store on Friday. The app had disappeared from the store due to a technical issue and should be back up shortly, a source familiar with the matter said. AppleInsider reported that existing app installations were still working on the latest versions of iOS and tvOS. Apple (NASDAQ: ) did not immediately respond to Reuters' request for comment.

Amazon Prime Video disappears from Apple's app stores
description: Amazon Prime Video disappears from Apple's app stores
